  --cm-video-brand-primary: var(--yb-grape-jelly, #7e1fff);

  --cm-video-brand-gradient: linear-gradient(93.29deg, var(--cm-video-brand-primary) -0.72%, var(--cm-video-brand-secondary) 101.96%);
  --cm-video-text-primary: var(--yb-text-primary, #1d2228);
  --cm-video-text-secondary: var(--yb-text-secondary, #6e7780);
  --cm-video-text-on-dark: var(--yb-white, #ffffff);
  --cm-video-text-on-brand: var(--yb-white, #ffffff);
  --cm-video-bg-primary: var(--yb-background-color, #ffffff);
  --cm-video-bg-secondary: var(--yb-l2-background-color, #f5f8fa);
  --cm-video-bg-card: var(--yb-background-color, #ffffff);
  --cm-video-bg-overlay: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  --cm-video-bg-hover: var(--yb-selected-item-background, #f5f8fa);
  --cm-video-border-light: var(--yb-dirty-seagull, #e0e4e9);
  --cm-video-border-accent: var(--cm-video-brand-primary);
  --cm-video-border-on-dark: var(--yb-white, #ffffff);
  --cm-video-shadow-light: var(--yb-elevation3-box-shadow, 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 0 1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1));
  --cm-video-shadow-elevated: var(--yb-elevation4-box-shadow, 0 4px 16px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 0 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05));
  --cm-video-focus-accent: var(--yb-tab-focus-accent, rgba(126, 31, 255, 0.5));
  --cm-video-hover-overlay: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --cm-video-controls-bg: var(--cm-video-brand-gradient, linear-gradient(93.29deg, #7e1fff -0.72%, #2f42d4 101.96%));
  --cm-video-controls-text: var(--cm-video-text-on-brand, #ffffff);
  --cm-video-controls-progress-height: 8px;
  --cm-video-repeat-bg: var(--cm-video-brand-gradient, linear-gradient(93.29deg, #7e1fff -0.72%, #2f42d4 101.96%));
  --cm-video-repeat-text: var(--cm-video-text-on-brand, #ffffff);
  --cm-video-repeat-border: var(--cm-video-border-on-dark, #ffffff);
  --cm-video-repeat-border-radius: 11px;
  --cm-video-label-bg: var(--cm-video-bg-card, #ffffff);
  --cm-video-label-shadow: var(--cm-video-shadow-light, 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 0 1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1));
  --cm-video-label-border-radius: 8px;
  --cm-video-label-padding: 8px;
  --cm-video-label-margin: 0 17px;
}
html[data-color-theme-enabled][data-color-scheme='dark'] {
  --cm-video-bg-overlay: rgba(16, 21, 24, 0.6);
  --cm-video-border-on-dark: var(--yb-gray-hair, #f0f3f5);
}
html[data-color-theme-enabled][data-color-scheme='transparent'] {
  --cm-video-bg-overlay: rgba(16, 21, 24, 0.8);
  --cm-video-bg-card: var(--yb-transparent-popover-background, rgba(16, 21, 24, 0.8));
  --cm-video-shadow-light: var(--yb-transparent-popover-box-shadow, 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 0 1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1));
}
@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
  html[data-color-theme-enabled] {
    --cm-video-bg-overlay: rgba(16, 21, 24, 0.6);
    --cm-video-border-on-dark: var(--yb-gray-hair, #f0f3f5);
  }
}

<script>
// キャンペーン適用時のみ表示
$(function () {
function masterCampaignUpdateMessage() {
var $msgs = $('.Master_Regist_Msg_Campaign01');
var found = false;
$msgs.each(function() {
var $msg = $(this);
if ($msg.length) {
if ($('html').hasClass('is-master')) {
// 通常時
$msg.html('今なら<em>14日間無料</em>でお試し');
} else {
// マスターコース以外の表示
$msg.html('今だけ<em>スーパープレミアムコースで</em>限定公開中!');
}
found = true;
}
});
return found;
}
if (masterCampaignUpdateMessage()) {
return;
}
var attempts = 0;
var maxAttempts = 10;
var pollInterval = setInterval(function() {
attempts++;
if ($('.Master_Regist_Box').length && masterCampaignUpdateMessage()) {
clearInterval(pollInterval);
return;
}
if (attempts >= maxAttempts) {
clearInterval(pollInterval);
}
}, 100);
});
// タイム指数マスター用
$(function () {
var params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
if (window.location.pathname.indexOf('/race/speed.html') > -1) {
if (params.get('master') !== '1') {
$('.master_course_infoText01, .master_course_infoText02').hide();
}
}
});
// 出馬表_メモ用
$(function () {
if (window.location.pathname.indexOf('/race/movie.html') > -1) {
if (!$('.NoteTable_Container').length) {
$('.master_course_infoText01, .master_course_infoText02').hide();
}
}
});
</script>

function getDataOdds(baken_kind, housiki) {
if (typeof housiki == 'undefined') {
housiki = '';
}
$("#odds_view_result").html('');
if (housiki != '') {
var url = "../odds/odds_get_form.html?type="+baken_kind+"&race_id=202506050811&housiki="+housiki+"&rf=shutuba_submenu";
} else {
var url = "../odds/odds_get_form.html?type="+baken_kind+"&race_id=202506050811&rf=shutuba_submenu";
}
$("[id^=odds_navi_] a").each ( function() { $(this).removeClass("Active"); } )
$.ajax({
type: "GET",
cache: false,
url: url,
data: null,
success: function(data)
{
$('#odds_navi_' + baken_kind + ' a').addClass('Active');
window.history.pushState(null,null, url.replace('odds_get_form','index'));
$("#odds_view_form").empty().append(data);
}
});
}
</script>

//# sourceURL=http://debug/test1223.js
var is_logined = 0;
var update_myrace_item = function(race_id) {
var _action_api_url = 'https://race.netkeiba.com/api/api_post_my_race.html';
var _data = { pid : 'api_post_my_race' };
_data.input       = 'UTF-8';
_data.output      = 'json';
_data.race_id     = race_id;
$.ajax( { type     : 'POST',
url      : _action_api_url,
data     : _data,
dataType : _data.output,
cache    : false,
success  : function( json )
{
if (json.status == 'NG') {
console.log('status:NG reason:'+ json.reason);
} else {
if ($(".MyRace-Item-"+race_id).hasClass("Active"))
{
$('.MyRace-Item-'+race_id).removeClass("Active");
$('.MyRace-Registration-Btn-'+race_id).text("Myレースに登録する");
} else {
$('.MyRace-Item-'+race_id).addClass("Active");
$('.MyRace-Registration-Btn-'+race_id).text("Myレースを解除する");
}
}
},
error  : function(XMLHttpRequest, textStatus, errorThrown)
{
console.log('XMLHttpRequest: %O',XMLHttpRequest);
console.log('textStatus: %s',textStatus);
}
});
};
$(function(){
//tablesorterの不具合のため、馬番がNULLの場合に馬名のソートの振る舞いを変更する
$("tbody .HorseInfo").each( function() {

<script>
"use strict"
function bamei_sort(str) {
const table = {
'ァ': 'ア', 'ィ': 'イ', 'ゥ': 'ウ', 'ヴ': 'ウ', 'ェ': 'エ', 'ォ': 'オ',
'ガ': 'カ', 'ギ': 'キ', 'グ': 'ク', 'ゲ': 'ケ', 'ゴ': 'コ',
'ザ': 'サ', 'ジ': 'シ', 'ズ': 'ス', 'ゼ': 'セ', 'ゾ': 'ソ',
'ダ': 'タ', 'ヂ': 'チ', 'ヅ': 'ツ', 'ッ': 'ツ', 'デ': 'テ', 'ド': 'ト',
'バ': 'ハ', 'ビ': 'ヒ', 'ブ': 'フ', 'ベ': 'ヘ', 'ボ': 'ホ',
'パ': 'ハ', 'ピ': 'ヒ', 'プ': 'フ', 'ペ': 'ヘ', 'ポ': 'ホ',
'ャ': 'ヤ', 'ュ': 'ユ', 'ョ': 'ヨ',
'ヮ': 'ワ', 'ー': 'ヵ',
};
let result = '';
for (let i = 0; i < str.length; i++){
const char = str[i];
if (table[char]){
result += table[char];
} else {
result += char;
}
}
return result;
}
$.tablesorter.addParser({
id: 'jra_sort',
is: function(s) {
return false;
},
format: function(s1) {
const regex = /[\u30A0-\u30FF]+.*(?:\r?\n|$)/; // 最初のカタカナから次の漢字までのパターン
var tmp1 = s1.match(regex);
if(tmp1){
tmp1 = bamei_sort(tmp1[0]);
return tmp1;
}
return s1;
},
type: 'text'
});
$(function(){
/* Area created in the intern Start */
const nullCheak = function(date){ return !date[0] ? true : false };
var firstTime = true;
const table_sorte = function(t_header_flg){
$('.Shutuba_Table th').unbind();
$.tablesorter.destroy( $('.Shutuba_Table'), true, function(table) {});
$('.Shutuba_Table').tablesorter({
headers: {
0: { sorter: "false" },
1: { sorter: t_header_flg[1] },
2: { sorter: "false" },
3: { sorter: "jra_sort"},
4: { sorter: "false" },
5: { sorter: t_header_flg[5]  },
6: { sorter: "false" },
7: { sorter: "false" },
8: { sorter: t_header_flg[8]  },

10: { sorter: t_header_flg[10] },
11: { sorter: "false" },

13: { sorter: "false" },
},
//tablesorterの不具合のため、馬番がNULLの場合に馬名のソートの振る舞いを変更する
textExtraction: function(node) {
var attr = $(node).attr('data-sort-value');
if (typeof attr !== 'undefined' && attr !== false) {
return attr;
}
return $(node).text();
}
});

$(e).text(len);

$(e).parent().addClass('Error');
} else {
$(e).parent().removeClass('Error');
}
});
function textLength(text){
var len = 0;
for (var i = 0; i < text.length; i++) {
(text[i].match(/[ -~]/)) ? len += 1 : len += 2;
}
return Math.ceil(len/2);
}

});
return false;
} else {
swal(data.msg);
}
}
}
});
});

});

<script>
// 相性度80％ - 100％にハイライト
function addHighlightToElement(selector) {
const elements = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
elements.forEach(element => {
const value = parseInt(element.textContent.trim());
if (value >= 80 && value <= 100) {
const parentTd = element.closest('td');
if (parentTd) {
parentTd.classList.add('Highlight');
}
}
});
}
addHighlightToElement('.Compatibility_Score');
addHighlightToElement('.Reliability_Score');
//波乱度の見方
$('.Compatibility_Description_Box').each(function () {
var box = $(this);
var btn = box.find('.Title');
var contents = box.find('> dl > dd');
btn.append('<span class="Icon_Arrow"></span>');
btn.click(function () {
btn.find('span').toggleClass('open');
contents.slideToggle(200);
});
});
</script>
<script>
// 相性度にハイライトを追加
$(document).ready(function () {
setTimeout(function () {
var spanElement = $('.Compatibility_Score span');
var compatibilityText = spanElement.text().trim().replace('%', '');
var compatibilityRate = parseFloat(compatibilityText);
if (!isNaN(compatibilityRate) && compatibilityRate >= 80 && compatibilityRate <= 100) {
spanElement.closest('td').addClass('HighLights');
}
}, 100);
});
// 波乱度のメーターを表示
$(document).ready(function () {
var upsetLevel = parseInt(''); //  は動的にレンダリングされる部分
var ul = $('.Upset_Level_List');
ul.children('li').each(function (index) {
if ((index + 1) === upsetLevel) {
$(this).addClass('active');
} else {
$(this).removeClass('active');
}
});
});
</script>

//function message slide
function FadeInHeader(obj,width) {
$("." + obj).animate(
{
left: "-=50"
},
2000,'linear',
function() {
var widthAll = Math.abs($("."+obj).position().left);
var widthRelative = $("."+obj).position().left;
if(widthAll >= width && widthRelative < 0) {
console.log('Ew, it sucks')
$("."+obj).css("opacity", 0);
$("." +obj).animate(
{
left: "850",
opacity: "0"
},
1000,
function() {
$("."+obj).css("opacity", "1");
}
);
}
FadeInHeader(obj,width)
}
);
}

if ($(".ListTopHeadline").length) {
$(".ListTopHeadline li").each(function() {

$(this).stop()
},function(){

})
}
if ($(".ListHeadline > li").length) {
$(".ListHeadline li").each(function() {
width += $(this).width();
});
$(".ListHeadline").css("width", width + "px");
FadeInHeader("ListHeadline",width);
$(".ListHeadline").hover(function(){
$(this).stop()
},function(){

})
$(".RightCaretDown").click(function() {

$(".ListHeadline").toggle();
});
}
});

<script>
$(function() {
// プレミアム案内modal02
var $window = $(window),
$overlay = $('.ModalOverlay'),
scrollbar_width = window.innerWidth - document.body.scrollWidth,
touch_start_y;
$window.on('touchstart', function(event) {
touch_start_y = event.originalEvent.changedTouches[0].screenY;
});
$('a.PremiumModalLink01').on('click', function() {
// プレミアム案内
$window.on('touchmove.noscroll', function(event) {
var overlay = $overlay[0],
current_y = event.originalEvent.changedTouches[0].screenY,
height = $overlay.outerHeight(),
is_top = touch_start_y <= current_y && overlay.scrollTop === 0,
is_bottom = touch_start_y >= current_y && overlay.scrollHeight - overlay.scrollTop === height;
if (is_top || is_bottom) {
event.preventDefault();
}
});
$('html, body').css('overflow', 'hidden');
if (scrollbar_width) {
$('html').css('padding-right', scrollbar_width);
}
$('.PremiumModal02').fadeIn(300);
});
// モーダル閉じる処理
var closeModal = function() {
$('body').removeAttr('style');
$window.off('touchmove.noscroll');
$overlay.animate({
opacity: 0
}, 300, function() {
$overlay.scrollTop(0).hide().removeAttr('style');
$('html').removeAttr('style');
});
};
$overlay.on('click', function(event) {
if (!$(event.target).closest('.ModalPremiumInfo').length) {
closeModal();
}
});
$('.Modal_Close').on('click', function() {
closeModal();
});

});
function show_AI_tenkai() {
$('.BalanceAna').show();
$('.Sec_Deploy_Race').hide();
$('.AiTenkai').addClass('Active').show();
$('.RaceExpect').removeClass('Active').hide();
$('.predictionTitle').text('AI展開予測');
$('#except_exception').hide();
$('#ai_exception,.race_tenkai_naviContainer .master_course_badge').show();
$('.predictionTitle').html('AI展開予測<em class="master_course_badge">マスター</em>');
}
function show_race_expect() {
$('.Sec_Deploy_Race').show();
$('.BalanceAna').hide();
$('.AiTenkai').removeClass('Active').hide();
$('.RaceExpect').addClass('Active').show();
$('.predictionTitle').text('展開予想');
$('#except_exception').show();
$('#ai_exception,.race_tenkai_naviContainer .master_course_badge').hide();
var $slider = $('#DeployRace');
// リサイズの強制
setTimeout(function () {
$slider.slick('setPosition');
$slider.slick('refresh');
$('.jyo_tab .Active a').trigger('click');
}, 200);
// slick再発火
setTimeout(function () {
if ($slider.hasClass('slick-initialized')) {
$slider.slick('unslick');
$slider.slick({
slidesToShow: 1,
dots: false,
infinite: true,
arrows: true,
autoplay: false,
speed: 300,
adaptiveHeight: true,
});
}
$('.jyo_tab .Active a').trigger('click');
}, 500);
}
});
</script>

// コーナーのクリックイベント
$("#Corner01").on("click", function(){
$(".PositionBtn_Group .ActiveLine").width(0);
$(".HorseIcon .SpeedUp,.HorseIcon .SpeedDown").remove();
ActiveCornerGet();
updateHorsePosition();
});
$("#Corner02").on("click", function(){
$(".PositionBtn_Group .ActiveLine").width("33.3%");
$(".HorseIcon .SpeedUp,.HorseIcon .SpeedDown").remove();
ActiveCornerGet();
updateHorsePosition();
});
$("#Corner03").on("click", function(){
$(".PositionBtn_Group .ActiveLine").width("67%");
$(".HorseIcon .SpeedUp,.HorseIcon .SpeedDown").remove();
ActiveCornerGet();
updateHorsePosition();
});
updateHorsePosition();
$('.DevDataCheckBox input').change(function(){
const ShowArea = $(".AiTenkaiArea01:visible, .AiTenkaiArea02:visible");
$(".HorseIcon .SpeedUp,.HorseIcon .SpeedDown").remove();
ShowArea.fadeOut("fast", function() {
updateHorsePosition();
updateCheckRap();
ShowArea.fadeIn();
});
});
if (!Boolean('')) {
hideTrackBias();
}
// バイアス表示
const element = $(".DevelopImg01");
const pattern = /^BiasPattern/;
let biasPatternClass = "";
$('.DevDataCheckBox .BiasSwitch input').change(function(){
element.attr('class').split(/\s+/).forEach(function(cls) {
if (pattern.test(cls)) {
biasPatternClass = cls;
}
});
if ($(this).is(':checked')) {
element.addClass(biasPatternClass);
$(".DevelopBiasTxt").fadeIn("fast");
} else {
element.removeClass(biasPatternClass);
$(".DevelopBiasTxt").fadeOut("fast");
}
});
});
/**
* 非マスター会員の場合はトラックバイアスを表示させない
* note : テキストも背景色消す
*/
function hideTrackBias() {
const $img = $('.DevelopImg01');
$img.attr('class').split(' ').forEach(function(name) {
if (name.startsWith('BiasPattern')) $img.removeClass(name);
});
$('.DevelopBiasTxt').children().each(function (_, e) {
$(e).removeClass();
$(e).text('');
});
}
</script>

<script>
var is_shogai = "";
$(document).ready(function () {
if (is_shogai == "1") {
$('#toggleSwitch').prop('checked', false);
show_race_expect();
} else {
$('#toggleSwitch').prop('checked', true);
show_AI_tenkai();
}
$('#toggleSwitch').on('change', function () {
if ($(this).is(':checked')) {
show_AI_tenkai();
} else {
show_race_expect();
}
});
function show_AI_tenkai() {
$('.BalanceAna').show();
$('.Sec_Deploy_Race').hide();
$('.AiTenkai').addClass('Active').show();
$('.RaceExpect').removeClass('Active').hide();
$('.predictionTitle').html('AI展開予測<em class="master_course_badge">マスター</em>');
}
function show_race_expect() {
$('.Sec_Deploy_Race').show();
$('.BalanceAna').hide();
$('.AiTenkai').removeClass('Active').hide();
$('.RaceExpect').addClass('Active').show();
$('.predictionTitle').text('展開予想');
$('.jyo_tab li a.Active').trigger('click');
}
});
// ラップ予測を「分:秒:ミリ秒」に変換
$(document).ready(function () {
$('tr.HaronTime td').each(function () {
var cellContent = $(this).html();
var parts = cellContent.split('<br>');
if (parts.length > 1) {
var totalValue = parseFloat(parts[0].trim());
if (!isNaN(totalValue)) {
var formattedTime = convertToTimeFormat(totalValue);
$(this).html(formattedTime + '<br>' + parts[1].trim());
}
}
});
});
function convertToTimeFormat(decimalTime) {
var minutes = Math.floor(decimalTime / 60);
var seconds = Math.floor(decimalTime % 60);
var milliseconds = Math.round((decimalTime % 1) * 10);
// 1分未満の場合は分の表示を省略して「秒.ミリ秒」にする
if (minutes > 0) {
return minutes + ':' + (seconds < 10 ? '0' + seconds : seconds) + '.' + milliseconds;
} else {
return seconds + '.' + milliseconds; // 1分未満なら分を省略
}
}
$(document).ready(function () {
let theme = "19011";
let theme2 = "19104";
let theme3 = "19091";
const url = window.location.href;
if (url.includes("newspaper")) {
theme = "19041";
theme2 = "19105";
theme3 = "19092";
} else if (url.includes("shutuba")) {
theme = "19040";
theme2 = "19104";
theme3 = "19091";
}
$(".Aisho_Blurred_Wrap .Master_Regist_Btn").attr("data-theme", "19011");
$(".Aisho_Blurred_Wrap .Master_Regist_Btn").attr("id", "a_monthly_goods_link_" + "19011");
$(".DevelopOpinionArea .MasterPush").attr("data-theme", theme);
$(".DevelopOpinionArea .MasterPush").attr("id", "a_monthly_goods_link_" + theme);
$(".TrackBiasTxt01.MasterPush").attr("data-theme", theme2);
$(".TrackBiasTxt01.MasterPush").attr("id", "a_monthly_goods_link_" + theme2);
$(".PositionPickupHorseWrap .MasterPush").attr("data-theme", theme3);
$(".PositionPickupHorseWrap .MasterPush").attr("id", "a_monthly_goods_link_" + theme3);
$('.MasterPush').css('cursor', 'pointer');
$(".MasterPush").on('click', function () {
var url = 'https://regist.netkeiba.com/?pid=master_introduction';
window.location.href = url;
});
});
</script>

<script>
$(document).ready(function(){
//
var $slider = $('#DeployRace');
if($slider.hasClass('slick-initialized')){
$('.jyo_tab li  a').removeClass('Active');
$('.jyo_tab li').eq(0).find('a').addClass('Active');
$slider.slick('slickGoTo', parseInt(0));
}else{
$slider.slick({
slidesToShow: 1,
dots: false,
infinite: true,
arrows: true,
autoplay: false,
speed: 300,
adaptiveHeight: true,
});
}
$slider.on('afterChange', function(event, slick, currentSlide){
$('.jyo_tab li a').removeClass('Active');
var curSlider = $(slick.$slides[currentSlide]);
var ChangeslideIndex = curSlider.data('slick-index');
$('.jyo_tab li').eq(ChangeslideIndex).find('a').addClass('Active');
});
$('.jyo_tab a').click(function(e){
e.preventDefault();
var activeLi = $(this).closest('li');
var slideIndex = $('.jyo_tab li').index(activeLi);
$slider.slick('slickGoTo', parseInt(slideIndex));
});
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var gv_umai_first_trial_state = '';
$(document).ready( function(){
var yoso_jra_nar = new YosoJraNar('https://yoso.netkeiba.com');

id: "delay_umai_baken",

],

});
});

};

}
});

<em class="Subtitle" style="display: none"></em>
<a href="https://yoso.netkeiba.com/senmonshi/jra/?rf=pcrace_shutuba" title="競馬専門紙一覧" class="LinkMore Heading_Win">販売一覧</a>
</h3>
<div id="umai_goods_list_f_view">
<div class="FileLoader"><img src="https://cdn.netkeiba.com/img.race/common/img/common/gif-load.gif?20190116" alt=""></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<script src="https://cdn.netkeiba.com/img.race/common/js/jquery.lazyscript.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
var _race_id = '202506050811';
var _show_id = 'umai_goods_list_f_view';
var _is_apppli = '';
var options = {
type: "visible",
id: "delay_umai_goods_f",
scripts: [
],
success: function () {
get_umai_goods_f_data(_race_id, _show_id, function(data) {
// console.log(data);
if (data.status == 'OK') {
$("#sec_umai_goods_f").css("display", "block");
$("#" + _show_id).html( data.html );
}
});
}
};
$.lazyscript(options);
// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
function get_umai_goods_f_data(_race_id, _show_id, _callback)
{
console.log('get_umai_goods_f_data');
var _data = {};
_data.input       = 'UTF-8';
_data.output      = 'jsonp';
_data.race_id     = _race_id;
_data.show_id     = _show_id;
_data.rf_param    = 'pcrace_shutuba';
if(_is_apppli === '1'){
_data.appli_modal     = _is_apppli;
}
$.ajax({
type     : 'GET',
url      : 'https://yoso.netkeiba.com/senmonshi/api/api_get_goods_list_f.html',
data     : _data,
dataType : _data.output,
success  : function( data ){
if (undefined != _callback) {
_callback( data );
}
},
error    : function(XMLHttpRequest, textStatus, errorThrown) {
console.log('XMLHttpRequest: %O',XMLHttpRequest);
console.log('textStatus: %O',textStatus);
}
});
}
});
</script>

<script>
document.querySelectorAll(".icon_sharelink").forEach(link => {
link.addEventListener("click", function(event) {
event.preventDefault();
const url = this.getAttribute("data-url");
navigator.clipboard.writeText(url)
.then(() => {
const toast = document.getElementById("ToastMessage");
toast.classList.add("show");
setTimeout(() => {
toast.classList.remove("show");
}, 3000);
})
.catch(err => console.error("コピーに失敗しました", err));
});
});
